title: Ben Simmons Finally Plays, but the Nets Lose
description: A rusty Ben Simmons isnâ€™t the difference maker in his first appearance for Brooklyn.
dc:creator: Tania Ganguli
media:credit: Monique Jaques for The New York Times
media:description: The Nets finally had Ben Simmons and Kyrie Irving on the court together, but that was not enough to beat the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday.
